question: [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/move_vm_ext/write_op_converter.rs] [Function: convert()] [Double creation prevention] Lines 240-247 return error when metadata exists for New op - can race conditions in parallel execution cause some validators to see metadata while others don't, leading to inconsistent error handling and forks? (Critical)
